title: Hard Betrayal
description: Revenge is like a peeled onion. Each layer is crucial.The men responsible for her brother's murder can't go unpunished. But will her plan work? What about collateral damage? Allies change and unforeseen consequences come to light when a secret threatens it all.Will her friends stand by her? Should they?If you loved the dynamic, supportive, have-your-back, friendships in Hard Revenge, youâ€™re sure to love Hard Betrayal.(Rated R for strong language)
author: Jason   Stanley
